trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around August 12th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi am on the phone with my brother,rounding the bend in my street when i see in the northern sky-about 9:30 position ( directly in my line of vision) what appears to be 5-6 what i assume to be small planes- each w\ what appears to be 2 headlights each,of a red\orangish color...a shimmery almost twinkly quality to the light,and they're in a vertical almost v formation... i say aloud " what the hell is that?!" . i stopped my car in the middle of the street to watch these things.. they appear to be stationary. i think of chinese lanterns ( i dunno why) and cell phone towers..( again,i dunno why) -as i watch these the lights shimmer\twinkle and disappear-as if they went into a cloud bank. i pulled into my driveway-parked and rapidly got out-looking for these things-or the clouds....there were no clouds-or cloudbanks. i was excited-as i had just seen something unusual,but calm ...i did not experience the hairs on the back of my neck standing on end. i was\am more curious as to what it was that i saw. i called fox lake police,lake county sherrif and the faa.the police and sheriff suggested it was meteor showers...what i saw was nothing like a metoer shower.
Summary: Vertical formation of 5-6 craft w/ orangy lights.
